author: .vbuterin
content: I edited the proposals to take into account stack use

author: .vbuterin
content: 32 * 1024 * a lot of call frames can still be a big deal

author: atoulme
content: Would EIP-1153 also intersect with your interest here? Seems cheap with a linear cost right now

author: .vbuterin
content: The current gas cost in EIP-1153 is higher than the minimum I advocate (which would be 64 gas for a key/value pair which is 64 bytes total)

author: .vbuterin
content: Ah, I guess realistically we have to keep around the concept of extending, because lots of contracts use `MSIZE` as a "next thing here" pointer
